item.description:
Releasing Stress, Tension and Fear
with PRISCILLA BENGTSON and GANESH IYER

East meets West in this powerful workshop designed to provide you with the tools you need to live a life with less stress, tension and fear. Priscilla will work with you on exploring the thoughts, beliefs and actions that hold you from obtaining what you want in life. Ganesh will teach you the basics of Yoga philosophy, breathing, yoga postures and sequencing. Also, how Yoga can help you reduce stress, tension, and manage negative emotions. Please dress to move.

To register, please call (860) 301-1468 or visit www.simplyfitnessonline.com.

Simply Fitness
GLASTONBURY CT
Time: 6:30 to 8:30 p.m.
Cost: $50

Simply Fitness for the spirit, mind and body is located at 122A Naubuc Avenue, Suite 210, Glastonbury, CT 06033. We are located in the beautiful Copper Beech building in the heart of Glastonbury. Easy access from Route 2, I-91 and Main Street, Glastonbury.
item.name: Releasing Stress, Tension and Fear
